version_description:
- Change the seek button behavior to change the track to the next / previous one.
- Be controllable the playing state from remote control ( Only for Pro version. )
- Improve battery consumption.
- Fix the problem about the order of the tracks in playlist.
- Bug fix.
- Add resume play feature for Pro version.

Add buttons in speed settings dialog
- Buttons to change speed +0.01 / -0.01
- Buttons to change speed to a preset value.
* The preset value can be changed by long pressing the button.

Add buttons in speed settings dialog
- Buttons to change speed +0.01 / -0.01
- Buttons to change speed to a preset value.
* The preset value can be changed by long pressing the button.

Add device rotation support
Add a continuous mode setting for Pro version
Improve issues related to pro version upgrade.
Bug fixes

- Add support for files in other apps
( Select "Audipo" or "Copy to Audipo" in the share menu in other apps )
- Expand button size

- Add support for files in other apps
( Select "Audipo" or "Copy to Audipo" in the share menu in other apps )
- Expand button size
- Bug fix

Supports Split View
Supports Safe Area
Add List View for current list ( Tap the title in playback view )
Bug fix
- Bug fix ( related to a button of control center and headphone)
Bug fixes

Add an option to pause when headset unplugged.
Fix Remote Control button behavior.

Add List View for current list ( Tap the title in playback view )
